BEACH HUT

BLOSSOM

COAST PATH
This invigorating scent reminds us of taking in the captivating views, and listening to the roar of the waves as we walked along the coast in Cornwall.

CRANBERRY ORANGE
The classic combination of Cranberry & Orange. With refreshing orange and sweet cranberry combined, and notes of raspberry, apricot and peach.

LAVENDER & VANILLA

LILY & TANGERINE

ROMANCE

VANILLA & SANDALWOOD

WILDFLOWERS

WINTER ROSE & PINK PEPPER

WOODLAND TRAIL
Ground yourself with this woody, mystical scent. Inspired by grounding elements of the forest to nourish and connect with the wilderness.

CANDLE CARE AND SAFETY
These candles have a real flame and fire is hot! Please apply common sense and be cautious always when lighting and handling a lit candle.

Candles must be kept well clear of all combustible materials including flammable decorations, foliage and electrical equipment.

Don’t leave a lit candle unattended.

When lighting for the first time, please allow the wax to melt to the very sides of the jar – if you don’t do this, it can cause the candle to ‘tunnel’ and waste wax. The maximum recommended burn time is 4 hrs per burn. Always trim wick after each burn to 5mm by cutting off the burnt ends when cool. Not trimming the wick will cause the flame to become large.

The candle vessel will get hot. Never burn the candle wax fully, leaving a minimum of 5mm of wax in the base of the jar. Always place the candle on top of a coaster to avoid damage to furniture.

{'product': 'Personalized Metal Family Bar and Grill Sign', 'description': 'This personalized metal family bar and grill sign is the perfect piece to decorate your home bar or personal grilling space. 18" wide x 11" tall x 16g steel

-Mounting
1/4" Mounting Holes for easy surface mounting

-Finishes
RAW STEEL -DARK (EVEN BLACK) - Raw Steel is a highly recyclable material that gets reused over and over again. This makes the finish and color vary from piece to piece, to sometimes even black. Left untreated, the Raw Steel will rust and develop a natural patina completely unique to your environment.
INDOOR FLAT CLEAR -DARK (EVEN BLACK) - The Indoor Flat Clear finish is an oil-based matte clear coat that makes the steel darker, sometimes even black. This finish will hold up well inside and is easy to clean.
OUTDOOR SILVER - The Outdoor Silver finish is a bright silver powder coat with a slight sparkle. This UV protected finish will protect the steel in the toughest conditions including outside in wet and salty environments. Powder coat is a thick industrial coating that is VOC free and holds up for many years.
OUTDOOR GLOSS CLEAR - The Outdoor Gloss Clear finish is a glossy clear powder coat that makes the steel darker, sometimes even black. This UV protected finish will protect the steel in the toughest conditions including outside in wet and salty environments. Powder coat is a thick industrial coating that is VOC free and holds up for many years.
OUTDOOR FLAT BLACK - The Outdoor Flat Black finish is a matte black powder coat. This UV protected finish will protect the steel in the toughest conditions including outside in wet and salty environments. Powder coat is a thick industrial coating that is VOC free and holds up for many years.
OUTDOOR GLOSS WHITE - The Outdoor Gloss White finish is a glossy white powder coat. This UV protected finish will protect the steel in the toughest conditions including outside in wet and salty environments. Powder coat is a thick industrial coating that is VOC free and holds up for many years.
OUTDOOR GLOSS RED - The Outdoor Gloss Red finish is a glossy, bright red powder coat. This UV protected finish will protect the steel in the toughest conditions including outside in wet and salty environments. Powder coat is a thick industrial coating that is VOC free and holds up for many years.
ALUMINUM - The Aluminum finish is the best option if you want the look of shiny metal or stainless steel on a budget. This finish is rust-proof and weather-proof (great for marine environments) and is lightweight. Aluminum is also a soft metal and scratches easily, so please be careful when opening your package.
ALUMINUM POWDER (GLOSS CLEAR, FLAT BLACK, GLOSS WHITE, GLOSS RED) - These Aluminum powder coat finish options will help prevent chips and scratches and give you more color choices. These UV protected finishes will protect the Aluminum in the toughest conditions and help prevent oxidation over time.
GALVANIZED - Galvanized refers to a process in which steel is coated with a layer of zinc to protect it from corrosion. The appearance of galvanized metal is characterized by a shiny, silver-gray surface. The coating gives the material a distinct metallic luster. Over time, the zinc coating may develop a matte gray patina as it weathers, but the initial appearance is typically bright and reflective.', 'uniqueAttributes': {'Personalized': 'This sign can be personalized with up to three lines of text, making it a unique and meaningful gift for any occasion.', 'Custom design': 'The sign is made from raw steel, which allows for a variety of finishes and colors to be applied. {'product': 'Custom MONOGRAM Cocktail Ice CYLINDER Tray', 'description': "Unleash your inner mixologist with our custom ice cylinder mold! Thanks to its surface-to-volume ratio, ice cylinders actually dilute your drink less than standard ice cubes. They also look super chic in a round rocks glass. So it turns out circles aren't completely pointless! (You’re welcome, fellow dad joke enthusiasts).

Bemold custom ice molds effortlessly transform any beverage into an extraordinary work of art. Cheers!

FEATURES:
- Makes ice cylinders 2.2 inches in diameter - perfect for a standard rocks glass
- Personalize each ice cube with up to three initials in the classic round monogram style
- Soft silicone remains flexible when frozen, making removing cubes a breeze
- Made-to-order by a small business in Concord, Massachusetts
- Designed to last a lifetime
- Lids are NOT available for this mold type.

MATERIALS:
- Food grade silicone
- Free of BPA, lead, and phthalates
- Dishwasher and oven safe up to 400F

MEASUREMENTS:
- 2 cylinder ice tray: 4.8” length x 2.5” width x 2.3” height
- 4 cylinder ice tray: 6.2” length x 5.6” width x 2.3” height
- 7 cylinder ice tray: 7.4” length x 6.7” width x 2.3” height
- Ice cylinders: 2.2” diameter x 2.0” height

HOW TO ORDER:
Please type the initials from left to right in the EXACT order you want them to appear on ice. For an individual’s monogram, it is traditional to arrange the initials from left to right as first name, last name, middle name. So for Sarah Jessica Parker, you would type SPJ. For a couple’s monogram, it is traditional to arrange the initials from left to right as one person’s first name, the shared last name, and the other person’s first name. So for Victoria and David Beckham, you would order VBD. To see how your initials will appear, please reference the style guide in the product photos.

Please note that the beloved round monogram style requires letters to conform to a circle. As a result, some letters may look unusual depending on their placement. For the full monogram alphabet, please reference this link: https://tinyurl.com/mdxmcm5s

Visit our shop or to find our listings for ice trays that allow you to include plain text or a custom logo / graphic!

TIPS FOR PHOTOGENIC ICE:
1. Use distilled water: Tap water naturally contains impurities which cause white cloudy balls to form in the cubes as they freeze. To minimize cloudiness, we recommend filling your mold with distilled water, which is free from impurities and is readily available at grocery stores for about $1 per gallon.
2. Remove air bubbles: The surface of your ice cubes may have pockmarks created by air bubbles that were stuck inside your design or clinging to the walls of the ice tray when frozen. Prevent this by using a chop stick or butter knife to release any visible air bubbles from the mold before freezing.
3. Temper the ice: Before putting the ice in your drink, place it on a dinner plate for a few minutes to allow it to warm up slighty. This prevents it from cracking as soon as it hits the room temperature liquor.
4. Allow frost to form: As the ice warms up outside of the freezer, moisture in the air will condense on the surface of the ice, creating a nice frost that makes the appearance of your monogram much sharper. That's the secret to our photos!
5. Keep it dry: here's our spin on the old adage - ice before liquor, design fades quicker. Liquor before ice, stays looking nice. In other words, carefully add your tempered, frosty ice cube to your drink last to keep the design dry. If you pour room temperature liquor over your frosty design, it will quickly vanish, and you'll be quite disappointed!

BULK ORDER INQUIRIES:
Send us a message with your quantity and delivery timeframe and we'd be happy to get back to you with pricing!

POLICIES:
- Our refund policy is available upon request.
- Our return/exchange policy can be located at the bottom of every listing.
- Have a question? The best way to contact us is to send us a direct message.

{'product': 'Personalized Anniversary Candle', 'description': 'Celebrate your love and commitment with our Anniversary Candle, the perfect gift for any kind of anniversary! Whether you're searching for a special first anniversary gift or commemorating a 50th year of marriage, this candle is a thoughtful and sentimental gesture that will surely be cherished. This personalized candle makes an excellent gift for your husband or wife, friend, or parents, expressing your love and gratitude for all the years spent together.

Our candles are hand poured in our studio in Tennessee. We use a natural soy coconut wax blend, premium phthalate-free fragrance infused with essential oils, and cotton wicks. Our soy coconut wax is a sustainable alternative to paraffin that burns evenly and binds beautifully with our toxin-free fragrances to produce a rich, enduring scent.
